recommendation: The Gilded Fork - Known for its exquisite tasting menus and elegant atmosphere.
The Blue Note Lounge - Features jazz and blues performances nightly.
Old Town District - Explore cobblestone streets, historic buildings, and guided tours.
The Grand Bazaar - A vibrant market with local crafts, souvenirs, and food stalls.
Green Park - A serene green space perfect for picnics and leisurely walks.
City Museum - Offers interactive exhibits and local history displays.
City Art Gallery - Showcases contemporary art from local and international artists.
